import React, {useState} from 'react'; import pin1 from '../static/media/Road/Road0002.png'; import pin2 from '../static/media/Road/Road0005.png'; import pin3 from '../static/media/Road/Road0006.png'; import pin4 from '../static/media/Road/Road0004.png'; import pin5 from '../static/media/Road/Road0003.png'; import road1 from '../static/media/Road/Road0001.png'; import team from '../static/media/Team.png'; import callout1 from '../static/media/Callout0001.png'; const Road = () => { const handleMouseOver = (percentage) => { console.log(percentage); } const [name, setName] = useState(roadmap[0].percentage); const [title, setTitle] = useState(roadmap[0].description); const roadmap = [{ percentage: '25', description: 'The sum amount will be allocated among the NFT artists and team members contributing to the project', }, { percentage: '50', description: "SAMABHAVA is a organization focused on supporting abandoned animals. It provides information on their mission, adoption opportunities, educational resources, and ways to contribute through donations or volunteering. It's a central platform for those passionate about animal welfare to connect and make a difference.", }, { percentage: '75', description: 'Will be launching a catchy comic about Peppy Stallion', }, { percentage: '100', description: 'Will be disclosed soon(something big coming up)', },] return (

handleMouseOver(ra)} /> handleMouseOver(2)} /> handleMouseOver(3)} /> handleMouseOver(4)} />

@25%

Contributed to SAMABHAVA, an organization caring for abandoned horses

  1. Progress @ 25%

    5% of primary sales will be donated to the Education Fund.

  2. Progress @ 50%

  3. Progress @ 75%

  4. Progress @ 100%

); }; export default Road;
